Projects

  • Analysis of Edge-Enhanced Raman
    I wrote my undergraduate thesis on a specific application of Raman spectroscopy: Edge-Enhanced Raman Spectroscopy (EERS). To organize, archive, and analyze this data (~1 TB) I developed a Python package. I'm working on making the source and collected data public.

  • deepzoom [-python | -go | ...]
    Unable to find a good (deepzoom) image server for images that are too large for system memory, I've set about making several. This project is in the early stages and is excitedly developing!
